name: Kotobuki Grand Prix
description:
Back of Jewel Case - PlayStation (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

Choose from one of eight characters, each with their own unique bike and riding style, in this crazy race where anything goes! Use wacky power-ups against the opposition over single races or in the story mode. Alternatively, take on a friend in a two-player head to head battle for the finish line. Kotubuki Grand Prix is a colourful and action-packed two-wheeled racer for players of all abilities!

  • Multiple game modes to choose from including story mode and two-player split screen.
  • Three challenging difficulty settings.
  • Eight wacky characters and bikes to master, plus four hidden boss characters to discover and defeat!
  • Six distinctive courses to ride on, plus a bonus hidden track!
  • Equip your character with a variety of weapons and power ups, from Nitros to Bazookas.
